name: Horace and the Robots
overview: A well made freeware Berzerk clone for the ZX Spectrum developed by Reptilia Design (Steve Snake, who also created the excellent KEGA Fusion SEGA emulator) in 2017. The game features the well known 80s 8-bit microcomputer character Horace (Horace Goes Skiing, Horace and the Spiders, etc.) as he takes on the evil robots, and of course the evil invincible boss, Evil Otto. Contains support for Currah Speech.
